name: Salesfusion
description:
Marketing tactics have come a long way from the batch and blast approach. As modern marketing evolved with technical components and data-driven strategies, small to mid-size businesses were left behind due to complexity, cost and resources. Salesfusion was created to help even the playing field. We designed our platform with the typical marketer – and the typical small marketing budget – in mind.
Native integrations with the major CRMs help get sales and marketing on the same page and make it easier to work together.
